patterns: Can you give me some travel tips for India?
What should I know before traveling to India?
Any advice for tourists visiting India?
responses: Make sure to carry bottled water and stay hydrated. Respect local customs and dress modestly when visiting religious sites. Be cautious with street food to avoid stomach issues.
It's advisable to have a local SIM card for better connectivity. Use registered taxis or rideshare services for transportation. Be mindful of your belongings in crowded places.
